text: Niedźwiedzice () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Chojnów, within Legnica County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It is located approximately east of Chojnów, north-west of Legnica, and west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== ==External links== Category:Villages in Legnica County
title: Niedźwiedzice, Legnica County
